front.title: SS7 MTP2-User Peer-to-Peer Adaptation Layer Implementer's Guide

abstract.t: This Internet-Draft provides information for the Internet community on clarifications and interpretations of the text of the SS7 MTP2-User Peer-to-Peer Adaptation Layer [M2PA] based on working group comments and experience at interoperability events. It also provides information on specification addendum and errata -- whether of an editorial or technical nature -- discovered to the date of this document.
